comment: Motion Control Tuning Parameters - Field-adjustable without rebuild

gyro.comment: Gyro low-pass filter cutoff frequency (1-20 Hz recommended)

tracking.comment: Time constants for target position/velocity smoothing (seconds)

motion.comment: General motion limits and control loop parameters

servo.comment: Servo unit conversions (205500/360 for AZ, 200000/360 for EL)

trpScan.comment: TRP scan deceleration and arrival parameters

azimuth.comment: Radar slew azimuth PID gains (aggressive for fast slew)

elevation.comment: Radar slew elevation PID gains (aggressive for fast slew)

accelLimits.comment: Maximum acceleration for manual joystick mode (Hz/s)

tuningNotes.note1: After editing this file, restart the application to apply changes
tuningNotes.note2: PID gains: Kp controls response speed, Ki eliminates steady-state error, Kd dampens oscillation
tuningNotes.note3: Time constants (tau): Lower = faster response but more noise. Typical range: 0.05-0.2s
tuningNotes.note4: Acceleration limits: Lower = smoother motion but slower. Higher = faster but may stress servos
tuningNotes.note5: For field tuning: Start with tracking PID, then scan modes, then slew modes
